text: Danylo Ihorovych Ihnatenko (; born 13 March 1997) is a Ukrainian football midfielder, who currently plays for SC Dnipro-1 on loan from FC Shakhtar Donetsk in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==Career== Ihnatenko is product of FC Metalurh Zaporizhya youth team system. His first trainer was Mykola Syenovalov. He made his debut for Metalurh Zaporizhya in the Ukrainian Premier League in a match against FC Dynamo Kyiv on 30 May 2015. ==References == ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Zaporizhia Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Shakhtar Donetsk players Category:FC Mariupol players Category:SC Dnipro-1 players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Ukraine under-21 international footballers Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Ferencvárosi TC footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Hungary Category:Ukrainian expatriate sportspeople in Hungary
title: Danylo Ihnatenko
